data.what_is:
1CRM enables businesses to create long-lasting customer relationships and experiences with the most intuitive, customizable and cost-effective customer relationship management (CRM) solution on the market. By focusing on a comprehensive and easy to customize CRM solution, 1CRM is putting tailored-fit CRMs within reach of businesses everywhere.

With so many CRMs available, what sort is right for you? You'll see CRMs that are limited sales & marketing CRM products, others that are good at Mass Emailing, and then some that include Order Management, Service Management, or Project Management. 

For businesses with up to about 250 users, the All-in-One type of CRM has proven popular - and that's where 1CRM fits in. 1CRM offers a Sales & Marketing CRM with strong Mass Email capabilities. But it also includes very comprehensive Order Management (Quotes, Invoices, Payments - as well as the Purchasing side), Service Management and Project Management. Throw in Timesheets, Expense Reports, Vacation & Sick Day tracking - and you can see why they call us an All-in-One CRM!

1CRM stands out to me for two things - reasonable price, and really good quote and invoice functions included within the CRM. Seemed well suited to a small/medium business when I found it, and it has been true for our business at least. The project management and customer service functions were just kind of a bonus for us when we were signing up - but we find we do use them now - so it keeps that information inside the one system as well, which is nice. When I initially just wanted to use it for a few months as a simple Sales & Marketing CRM, I had to learn a few admin functions to make those extra features invisible to most of my users, so the system would look the part of a simple Sales & Marketing CRM. Then later on I made some of them visible again as we expanded what we were doing with 1CRM into Order Management as well. On the other hand, the price is cheaper than most simple Sales CRMs, so the extra features seem to me to be pretty much free, making it hard to complain too much.

Consolidate business tools and streamline sales processes.
